title: Selling a bunch of graded 4s and 5s
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Selling a bunch of graded 4s and 5s
posts.post_content:
Paypal f/f is preferred.  Please contact me to discuss other options.

Shipping is $3 for 1 card and $.50 for each additional card.  Priority Mail small flat rate box is $5.60 and can hold up to 4 graded cards I believe.  Let me know if you'd prefer this method.

Clymer SGC 70 $90
Becker SGC 60 $70
Murray bat SGC 60 ***SC 350/25*** $70
Davis (Davis on front) SGC 60 $68

PM sent on clymer, abbatachio and devore.
I will take Clarke if m.o is acceptable but wont get out til Friday priority mail...tnx
